title: A bill to repeal section 403 of the Bipartisan Budget Act of 2013.
short_title: A bill to repeal section 403 of the Bipartisan Budget Act of 2013.
latest_major_action: Returned to the Calendar. Calendar No. 298.
summary: Repeals a provision of the Bipartisan Budget Act of 2013 that reduces the cost-of-living adjustment to the retirement pay of members of the Armed Forces under age 62.
summary_short: Repeals a provision of the Bipartisan Budget Act of 2013 that reduces the cost-of-living adjustment to the retirement pay of members of the Armed Forces under age 62.
